title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland (Part 2)
description: Alice is tasked with handing out prizes for a nonsensical Caucus-race. She then finds herself in a little cottage with a bottle labeled "Drink Me." After doing so, she rapidly starts growing. A group of animals outside the cottage try in vain to get rid of her. After several unsuccessful attempts, they barrage her with small cakes that, when eaten, shrink her enough to escape the cottage.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
reviewWords: Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand the story
comprehension: Similes and Metaphors                : Identify and understand similes and metaphors
